title: Workplace Interaction Learning Competency Strengthening Course

context.prior_knowledge: Work experience within an organization and possession of basic communication skills
context.additional_context: A practice-centered education program based on social constructivist approaches in digitally supported environments

learning_goals: Learners can generate at least three new domain-specific knowledge outcomes during collaborative problem-solving with peers.
Learners can apply at least two context-specific coaching strategies during interactions with supervisors to drive practical improvements.
Learners can propose at least one team-based learning opportunity design plan leveraging organizational structures and resources.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
